thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and State Lawmakers Strike Budget Deal

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and State Lawmakers Strike Budget Deal
text:
ALBANY, N.Y.—Gov. Andrew Cuomo and state lawmakers struck a budget deal Friday night to overhaul New York’s tax code in an effort to bypass aspects of the new federal tax law, implement a surcharge on Uber rides in Manhattan and pour new funding into New York City’s troubled public housing system.
The agreement seeks to work around the federal law’s $10,000 cap on deducting state and local taxes from a filer’s federal taxes. Over 1.7 million New Yorkers itemized more than $10,000 in the “SALT” deductions, according to the...
